label: AB2_tI48_142_d_ef-001
title: $\alpha$-PdSn$_{2}$ Structure
comments:
This structure is stable up to 600$^\circ$C. (Villars, 2016) 
 PdSn$_{2}$ has also been found in the \href{current_web_home_dir/AB2_oC24_41_2a_2b-001}{orthorhombic $C_{e}$ structure}. 
 The ICSD entry is from (Hellner, 1956), but we use the refined data from (K\"{u}nnen, 2000) for this presentation.
